channel.title: Comments on: Edit In Place, Visual Effects

item.title: By: On Influence and Automation
item.dc:creator: On Influence and Automation
item.description:
<strong>2007 Please Bring on the new Editors...</strong>
One of my predictions for 2007 is a new editor for the web with ‘edit in place’ functionality. I love the idea of edit in place… rather than logging in through a totally separate administration, a user can simply start typing and bui...
item.content:encoded:
2007 Please Bring on the new Editors…

One of my predictions for 2007 is a new editor for the web with ‘edit in place’ functionality. I love the idea of edit in place… rather than logging in through a totally separate administration, a user can simply start typing and bui…

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description:
Hi!
Your "Edit In Place" component is really great! :)
I'd very much like to see a rewrite to something that makes use of the script.aculo.us library!
Thanks for your good work!
item.content:encoded:
